entities.name: riddle

entities.name: slytherin's monster
entities.description: A creature that is unleashed when a piece of soul inhabits or possesses someone else.

relationships.description: The diary was created by Riddle as a Horcrux.
Riddle wanted to possess Harry Potter, so that Slytherin's monster would be unleashed again.
The diary belonged to Riddle and contained a fragment of his soul.
Slytherin's monster would be unleashed again if Harry Potter was possessed by Riddle's piece of soul.
